data.title: Robert Black
data.meta_description: “The double bass virtuoso and adventurer; champion for new challenges and renewed classics for his instrument, Robert Black presents bizarre, beautiful and unexpected solo works. Tunes. Noise. Action. Black has worked with and commissioned over 35 composers including John Cage, Richard Zvonar, Paul Dresher and many others as heard on his CD, State of the
data.text: “The double bass virtuoso and adventurer; champion for new challenges and renewed classics for his instrument, Robert Black presents bizarre, beautiful and unexpected solo works. Tunes. Noise. Action. Black has worked with and commissioned over 35 composers including John Cage, Richard Zvonar, Paul Dresher and many others as heard on his CD, State of the Bass (oo discs). He regularly performs with Basso Bongo, an electronic duo with percussionist Amy Knoles, the Bang on A Can All-Stars and many other collaborating musicians, theater companies and choreographers.”
